Package com.meme

Class SystemGoFo

java.lang.Object
com.meme.SystemGoFo
public class SystemGoFo
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible of the system itself and the system's important functions

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SystemGoFo()
    this constructor is responsible of initializing users list, playgrounds list and bookings list it also initializes/sets default values for IDs of playground and booking

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addBooking​(Booking booking)
    This function is responsible of adding a booking to the system when a booking is added to the system it stores this booking in the (chosen playground owner's) booking list and it gives the added booking a unique ID
    void addPlayground​(Playground playground)
    This function is responsible of adding a playground in the system when a playground user wants to add a playground to his profile in the system it takes inputs for the playground's details like its ID and adds the playground to the owner's playgrounds list
    void addUser​(User user)
    This function is responsible of adding a user to the system when a user registers it adds him to the users list
    Role getPlaygroundOwner​(Booking booking)
    this method gets the PlaygroundOwner object from the list of users exist in the system
    java.util.ArrayList<Playground> getPlaygrounds()
    this functions is responsible of displaying all playgrounds
    boolean IdExists​(java.lang.String id)
    this function is responsible of verifying the user's ID if it exists in the system or not when he wants to login
    User verfiyUser​(java.lang.String ID, java.lang.String password)
    this function is responsible of verifying the user's ID and Password when he wants to login

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SystemGoFo

      public SystemGoFo()
      this constructor is responsible of initializing users list, playgrounds list and bookings list it also initializes/sets default values for IDs of playground and booking

  • Method Details

    • addPlayground

      public void addPlayground​(Playground playground)
      This function is responsible of adding a playground in the system when a playground user wants to add a playground to his profile in the system it takes inputs for the playground's details like its ID and adds the playground to the owner's playgrounds list
      Parameters:
      playground - of type (Playground) in order to take playground's details

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(User user)
      This function is responsible of adding a user to the system when a user registers it adds him to the users list
      Parameters:
      user - of type (User) where it takes user's details and stores them in the system

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking​(Booking booking)
      This function is responsible of adding a booking to the system when a booking is added to the system it stores this booking in the (chosen playground owner's) booking list and it gives the added booking a unique ID
      Parameters:
      booking - of type (Booking) where it takes booking's details and stores them in the system

    • getPlaygrounds

      public java.util.ArrayList<Playground> getPlaygrounds()
      this functions is responsible of displaying all playgrounds
      Returns:
      playgrounds in the system

    • verfiyUser

      public User verfiyUser​(java.lang.String ID, java.lang.String password)
      this function is responsible of verifying the user's ID and Password when he wants to login
      Parameters:
      ID - where the user inputs his ID to be checked
      password - where the user inputs his password to be checked
      Returns:
      the user the system founds.

    • getPlaygroundOwner

      public Role getPlaygroundOwner​(Booking booking)
      this method gets the PlaygroundOwner object from the list of users exist in the system
      Parameters:
      booking - some booking made by the player.
      Returns:
      PlaygroundOwner the playground owner in which the player made the booking to

    • IdExists

      public boolean IdExists​(java.lang.String id)
      this function is responsible of verifying the user's ID if it exists in the system or not when he wants to login
      Parameters:
      id - where the user inputs his ID to be checked
      Returns:
      true if it exists, and false if it doesn't
